text:
Tomathy Innit, better known as Tommy to the residents of the lower levels of Pogtopia, is having a peaceful morning.
He started off by a shower and brushed his teeth after forcing himself out of bed before he proceeded to the kitchen to cook some eggs and bacon. He quickly toasted some bread in the toaster before going back to pan and once they were ready, he slid them onto a plate.
He scrolled through his Twitter feed as he ate the food in comfortable silence, reading whatever was trending at the moment.
After breakfast and cleaning up after himself, Tommy put on his uniform and left his apartment. The cafe was close so he just needed to walk for about 20 minutes to get there. That is if he doesn't bump into trouble along the way, which would take up an additional 10 or another 20 minutes.
Seriously, the lower levels of Pogtopia is not a safe place to live with all the thugs and small time criminals running around.
Anyway, when he arrives at the Cafe, he would start off by baking some pastries as well as making some sandwiches and put them on display after cooling a bit before proceeding to making a quick check in the pantry for drink ingredients like coffee, smoothies and more. He then would begin sweeping around the place a bit.
The bell rings and the blonde boy turned to look at the newcomer. "Good morning, Ranboo! How are you?" He greeted the dual coloured teen as he stepped in with a tired look on his face and hunched posture. "Tired? I just had some coffee brewed in the back, boob boy. Have a bit then help me with the tables while I sweep." Ranboo seemed to perk up a bit, thanking Tommy as he jogged to the breakroom.
The younger teen just shook his head before placing his broom on a wall and went to one of the racks. He grabbed two sandwiches, placed them on a plate and went to the backroom, where he sees his employee take a large sip of coffee. He quickly placed the sandwiches in front of him and exited the room, ignoring the surprised choke Ranboo let out when he noticed him.
Tommy lets out a cackle at that.
___
At 9.30 am, Innit Cafe is officially open for business. Tommy would man the register and make the drinks while Ranboo would busy himself with taking orders and serving the customers their food and drinks.
It was a slow day with only a few customers coming in, mostly regulars.
He looked up when the bell chimed, seeing a familiar face. "Eyy, MD! How are ya? Starting shift early?" He asked as he placed out two mugs of freshly brewed tea for Ranboo to deliver. "Eyyy Thomas! Yeah, I wanna clock in early today. Got a dinner date with Mamacita later!" The masked mexican said as he rolled up his sleeves and entered the backroom to clock in for his shift.
The rest of the day was mostly the same with MD helping out with either the dishes or helping Ranboo serve customers. When evening rolls around and they've finished cleaning, Tommy would close up shop and dismiss his employees with their pay for the week and a bag of pastries that didn't sell during store times.
He'd inspect the store one last time before locking up and went on his way home. 
Tommy had helped himself to some churros as he walked, taking in the sight of the city. He sped up his pace home so that he can change into his costume and start his usual patrols around the district.
Rinse and repeat and that was the usual routine Tommy had followed for months.
Sure it could be a bit boring sometimes (except when he's out patrolling) but hey, at least he's got money for groceries and bills.
___
Now, he's just out patrolling on his usual route and stopping crime as much as he can for the past three hours, giving a salute to any passing vigilantes like Ender (who he knows for a fact is Ranboo), Purpled, etc.
Tommy decided to take a quick break on a rooftop near the Cafe when he saw what seems to be a person, laying face down near the entrance.
He jumped down and approached the body, quickly checking for a pulse. He felt relief rush through him when he found one. Still, it was a weak one so Tommy had to move fast. He moved the man until he was facing up and once he got a good look of the man, he instantly recognized who was in front of him.
It was the Ghost hero, Phantom and he was fucking bleeding from the head.
So, he lifted the man up from the ground and proceeded to his apartment since 1)calling an ambulance is out of the question because the nearest one is in the upper levels of Pogtopia, which would take a very long time to get here, and 2)he can't call any of his friends since the man didn't carry a cell on him.
He was also concerningly light when Tommy gave him a piggyback ride.
Still, he carried the man up till they reached his floor and entered his apartment through the front door, making sure to lock it. Dropping the hero on his couch, Tommy went to bathroom and searched his closet for a first aid kit.
He walked back to the living room with the item in his hands, grabbed a basin with warm water and a towel. After cleaning and dressing the wound, he left to take a quick shower and a change of clothes. A blanket was draped onto the hero, after making checking if he still has pulse and is still breathing, and Tommy went to bed.
Such was the unusual routine of Vigilante/Cafe Manager.
The loud sound of crashing woke Tommy up with a jolt.
He instantly picked up whatever was next him, which was his baseball bat, and ran out into the living room where he saw a fucking furry arguing with Phantom.
Before he could even have time to react, a fist had connected to his stomach and a startled yelp rang throughout the chaos.
That yelp definitely did not come from him since air practically flew out of his lungs, which mostly resulted into a strangled shout coming from him.
"CHARLIE. HE'S A FUCKING CIVILIAN!"
Tommy looked up to glare at the intruders. Phantom seemed like he was in a mix of confusion, annoyed and tired, then there was the Shapeshifting Hero, Clover, who was holding up the injured hero and the motherfucker that punched him, the Slime Hero, Slimecicle. The tense silence grew as they all just stood there.
Tommy broke that silence by grabbing his bat again, which fell out of his hands when he was punched in the gut, and started swinging.
"Woah! Watch it!"
"Get the fuck out of my house or I will fucking gouge your eyes out of their fucking sockets!"
"Wait a minute-!"
"Your fucking friend is healed now so fucking leave!"
He's now forcefully shoving the three heroes out of his apartment, not caring if one of them had accidentally elbowed his face during the struggle or if they fell on their way out before he just slammed the door shut. He let out a tried groan as he looked at the clock, discovering it was in fact 3 am in the morning.
What the hell?
___
Ranboo thought Tommy was a good person.
The older man took him in when he was in a desperate need for a job and the pay was more than enough to cover for the shitty apartment he and Tubbo shared. He had this habit of spoiling him with bags of baked goods, whether to eat during breaks or for him to bring home to his roommate.
The Cafe itself was really cozy, had homely atmosphere and always kept clean, which completely contrasts all the other shops that surrounds it. They even had some potted flowers and some plants placed all around the place to spruce up the place even more.
Honestly, he feels lucky to land this job.
Ranboo also noticed that Tommy was a worrywart, despite what he tries to convince them otherwise.
He couldn't blame his boss for that since it's pretty well known that Pogtopia, especially in the poorer districts, weren't exactly the safest to live in. There's always a risk of being attacked if you weren't careful.
He's constantly looking out for his only two employees as well as some of his regulars. Which just makes it difficult for Ranboo to hide bruises and injuries from doing his vigilante work. The one time he came to work with a sprained wrist, which he covered by wearing a long sleeved shirt, he was dragged to the breakroom and had to sit in silence as his boss inspected his wrist.
An hour later with a cold pack pressed onto his injury and he finally backed off.
He can tell that the older blonde was worried for him but he never said anything about it, only continuing the day like it was normal. Except he was shoved into manning the cash register instead while Tommy covered him with MD for the entire week.
Ranboo swears to be extra careful after that.
Anyway, Ranboo came to work like usual on Monday and the first thing he noticed when he entered the Cafe was a nasty bruise on Tommy's face. He blinked in surprise and stared at it, ignoring the older man when he told him about the coffee.
"Ranboo! Hey, are you listening?"
"What happened to your face?"
Tommy just sighed. "Just fell on my fucking face, big man. It'll be gone sooner or later. Now go get some coffee so that we can start work." He grabbed his broom again and continued to sweep dust off the floors.
Ranboo wanted to ask more but held back, not wanting to accidentally make him mad so he quickly ran off into the break room.
___
"Eyyyy, Thoma- What the fuck happened to your face?"
Tommy lifted his head up to look at the masked mexican. "Oh, hey MD. It's fine. Just a shit morning. I fucking fell on my face." He placed a plate of waffles and a cup of coffee into the tray and moved them onto the counter, signalling Ranboo to deliver it.
"A... Are you sure? Man, you look like you got into a fight." MD said, stepping a it closer to have a better look of the bruise. Tommy just scoffed. "Oh I was in a fucking fight alright. A fight with gravity. Enough chit chat though, we got a lot of customers today and I don't want boob boy to be alone when we have to deal with a fucking Karen."
He watched as his employer grabbed a mug from a nearby cabinet and started working on the next order.
MD just silently moved to the breakroom, seeing as Tommy didn't want to talk about it, and clocked in for his shift. Maybe he can ask again later because that sure as hell doesn't look like a bruise you get from falling.
___
The day continued on as normal with the occasional customer asking him where the bruise came from.
Still, the day was done and dealt with, the entire place had been cleaned and Tommy did a quick inventory check before he locked up, getting ready to go home.
"Oh um, Tommy! Do you wanna go to the convenience store with us?" He looked at the Enderman hybrid with a surprised look on his face. "Huh?"
"Yeah man! Let's go for a quick Seven Eleven run. We can even buy those slushies you like so much!"
Tommy stood there for a second, contemplating on his options. On one hand, he can just decline and go home since he's tired as fuck but on the other hand, slushies and brain freezes. Something he likes very much, especially on stressful days.
"Eh, sure. I'll come. Lemme finish locking the cafe."
The trio walked towards the nearest Seven Eleven convenience store and entered in it with Tommy going straight for the slushie machine, Ranboo going off to one of the aisles while MD went to the freezers.
Thirty minutes later, they met back up at the cash register. Tommy held two slushies in the largest cups they had, Ranboo had a few chip bags on him and MD bought himself one frozen pizza as well as some sodas to share. They paid for their stuff and left, all agreeing to go to the park that was a couple blocks down.
"Eyyyy Thomas. I know you love that stuff but calm down a bit or you'll get a brain freeze."
"Fuck off MD. I fucking need this." Tommy continued to slurp the drink as he sat down on the bench. MD just scoffed in return as he sat down next to him. He looked at Ranboo and patted the spot next to him.
"C'mon kid, take a seat. Let's snack."
"Speaking of snacks, what did you get Ranboo?"
Ranboo sat down next to MD and runnahed through the contents of his plastic bag. "I got some Cheetos, Monster Munch and Pringles. Which one do you guys want?"
"Eyyy, gimme the Pringles man."
"I want the Cheetos."
After getting what they wanted and MD giving a bottle of Pepsi to Ranboo, they fell into conversation while snacking, only stopping for a minute when Tommy gave himself a brain freeze and a quick reassurance that he's fine.
Tommy had a great evening so far.
He hung out with Ranboo and MD for a bit before the tallest of the three received a call from his roommate and had to leave. MD stayed with him for a while and they both just talked before they both decided to part ways.
Deciding to use a shortcut to his apartment, he walked through an alleyway and navigated through it until he reaches an area he recognizes. Throwing both of his empty slushie cups into a dumpster, he continued walking towards the exit, if he didn't hear the soft rustling from said dumpster.
At first he thought, maybe it was a raccoon. Those adorable, fuzzy bastards would always be around these parts of town, scurrying through the garbage for food. Still, it wouldn't hurt to check, right?
5 minutes later, he's carrying a fellow vigilante, who he recognizes as Purpled, home.
He was heavily injured and is losing some blood from the slashes on his body. Tommy sped up his movements, still careful of the person behind him. He practically ran up the stairs and he slammed his door shut when he arrived into his apartment.
He gently placed the vigilante onto his couch, hoping that the blood wouldn't seep into the pillows, and went off to get the first aid kit again.
Seriously, it hasn't even been a day since the last one he took in.
He came back about a few minutes later with a rag and warm water. Tommy opens the kit with a satisfying click and looks into it. "Note to self, make a list and go to the pharmacy after work to restock on supplies." He mumbled to himself as he took out a needle and some thread.
Some of the slashes were large and they went deep enough to expose flesh so he had to work quickly.
After cleaning blood off some of the bigger wounds, Tommy started to stitch the skin back together.
___
".....Tommy...?"
"Stay down Purp. I just finished stitching you up. Want some painkillers?"
Purpled laid back down onto the couch, wincing when he felts jolts of pain run through his body. "..Yeah. Some cold water too."
Tommy nodded and walked into his kitchen to retrieve what he needed, coming back out shortly after. He placed a glass of iced water and a bottle of pills on the coffee table before he went to sit on the floor.
"So, wanna explain why I found you in a fucking dumpster?"
Purpled slowly sat up, still wincing at the random jolts of pain that went through his entire body. "Went to bust a drug ring. One of the fuckers had a tiger mutation and went after me."
"So you hid in the dumpster because...?"
"Because the fucker couldn't smell me when I hid there. Apparently, garbage overpowers the smell of blood."
He reached for the pills and took about two, reaching out again to grab the glass of water. He popped the pills into his mouth and drank the water, feeling the pills as it slid down his throat. Tommy's face scrunched up in disgust.
"Well, you're fucking lucky that none of your wounds were infected from that or else we would've had to risk your identity for a hospital visit."
Purpled gulped the last of the water and set down the glass. "Yeah, thanks for fixing me up, by the way. I appreciate it."
Tommy just scoffed. "You better be. I almost had a fucking heart attack when I saw you passed out around a bunch of trash."
The purple colored Vigilante just chuckled in response.
___
Purpled decided to stay for the night (after Tommy insisted that he stay so that his injuries can heal) and for breakfast as well so that he can have something decent to eat.
They both set up the couch with some pillows and a blanket so that he would at least be comfortable sleeping in it.
They said their goodnights to each other and Tommy went into his bedroom for a shower and a change of clothes before going to bed.
___
The next day was relatively calming.
Tommy woke up about an hour before Purpled. He had just finished showering and had moved on to cooking some pancakes.
About ten minutes later, Purpled had woken up when he heard the other fall from the couch and possibly had hit the coffee table.
"Mind grabbing the plates for me!? You know where they are!" He yelled into the living room as he flipped a pancake. He can hear the other grumble but still got up and walked into the kitchen to help.
When the food was finally done, Tommy split the pancakes between them (he placed about an extra three on Purpeld's plate) and gave the vigilante his share, who took it gratefully and went off to eat in the living room. You know since he actually needs to take off his mask to eat and Tommy didn't want to have him expose his identity just because he had to.
After they were done eating and Tommy had been reassured that his wounds are fine now, Purpled left the apartment.
____
Later in the evening, Tommy was out on his usual patrol route again when he stumbled upon Philza fucking Minecraft. Wait, what the fuck? He immediately booked it as fast as he can towards the opposite direction.
He can hear the hero giving chase as he leapt across buildings. "Going somewhere, mate?" The smug bastard appeared next to him in about seconds.
Fuck the man and fuck his ability to fly.
He growled lowly as he kept running, jumping down into a nearby alleyway and- oh fuck the Blade and Phantom were waiting for him. 
Fuck.
He was surrounded. At one end, Philza had just landed and blocked one end of the alleyway while the Blade and Phantom blocked the other.
Okay seriously, when the hell did heroes patrol around these parts?
"Tempest."
Tommy snapped his head to attention when the Blade spoke. He took a step back when the pink haired man took a step forward, still being cautious of the other hero that was behind him.
"Sorry but we're gonna have to arrest you." Phantom took this chance and stepped forward, a pair of cuffs in his hands.
"You did good in protecting this district. Unfortunately, there's no longer any need for vigilantes since we're going to be sending heroes to patrol around these parts now."
First thing he's gonna do after escaping these assholes is finding himself an informant because he desperately needs to keep himself updated.
"Where the hell is that little shit!?"
Just a few minutes ago, Tommy had decked Phantom in the face when he went up to apprehend the vigilante before he parkoured himself back up to the rooftop and cloaked himself in his illusions, or what he likes to call his mists, to turn himself invisible.
Yup, you read that right. Big Man Tommy is a fucking illusionist and it is Pog as hell.
First order of business though, he needs to get far away from them so that he can recover for a bit because Holy shit it's only been a few minutes and the drawbacks are starting to kick in. 
He jumped onto a fire escape on the side of one of the taller buildings and ran down it.
He kept running until he caught sight of the park again. "That'll do." He mumbled to himself as he slowed his pace and walked towards it. He found a bench and plopped himself down onto it. He uncloaked the illusion from his body and started to shiver for a bit, feeling the cold taking affect on him.
Now, to address the current situation.
So the main reason that the heroes are here is to arrest the vigilantes? Not because of the increased crime rates? Or the fact villain attacks happen more often in these particular areas? What the actual fuck.
Clearly, the Government didn't have their priorities straight.
Tommy groaned when the realization hits him. God, this is just gonna make his patrols even harder, huh? He let himself rest on the bench for a few minutes, contemplating whether or not he should continue the patrol.
He decided to just go home for now since there was a chance the three heroes were still searching for him and he does not want to see them again after having to deck Phantom in the face.
Tommy left the park and walked through the alleyways again to get home faster since he wanted to get out of the streets much faster. He did make a quick detour to a nearby pharmacy to buy some medical supplies.
He entered his apartment about half an hour later with two plastic bags full of medical stuff and maybe some chocolates from a convenience store with the spare cash that he had.
Tommy placed the items on his coffee table and went to the kitchen to boil some water. As he waited, he looked into one of his cabinets. "Instant noodles it is then."
As the noodles were cooking, he went to retrieve the first aid kit again and started stocking the items in. He stored the extras in the medicine cabinet in his bathroom. When he closed the cabinet, he took a quick look at the bruise on his face. He grabbed the ointment placed on the side of the sink and applied some onto where the bruise is.
By the time he was done, the noodles were finished cooking. He ate, washed the dishes and took a shower before going to bed.
___
"Thomas, it's fine! I can still walk."
"MD, you were limping when you came in. You either let me take a look at it or I'll drag you to the clinic myself."
"Eyyy.. I-It's fine, mi amigo. No need to go so far." MD chuckled nervously at the threat. Tommy just shoved him into the break room. He looked at Ranboo, who stood by the counter when the arguement happened. "Yo, Ranboo! Mind taking care of the rest of the cleanup?"
"Oh! Yeah, yeah! I can handle it!"
"Thanks big man. Sorry to dump this on you all of the sudden." With that, Tommy shut the door behind him.
Ranboo let out a breath of relief and winced as pain jolted through his body from the broken ribs. Maybe he can sneak a couple of pain killers from one of the cabinets during his break.
The last thing he wants is for Tommy to freak out over the fact that both of his employees had been injured and close up the cafe early just to take them both to the nearby clinic.
___
MD was placed to man the registers and washing the dishes instead of his usual job due to his twisted ankle. Ranboo was doing well on his own with delivering and taking orders.
Tommy was baking and making drinks like usual but he kept glancing at both MD and Ranboo, each time he looked like he wanted to ask something but held himself back.
Still, Mexican Dream felt bad since he made the kid worry about him so much even though it was his own fault. Who would've fucking thought he'd run into Clover during one of his patrols?
"Oh yeah, I just remembered something. Did you guys hear? Apparently some heroes are going to be patrolling around these parts now." Ranboo said as he approached the counter and placed an order into the basket they had.
Tommy looked surprised at first but then he broke into a smile. "Really? About damn time! As much as I love our local vigilantes, I fucking hope the heroes are going to get rid of the crime in this shithole. Seriously, it's been quite the fucking problem now." Both MD and Ranboo cringed at that, knowing full well that isn't what the heroes are here for.
Tommy looked so relieved and relaxed after hearing that bit of news.
He plucked the paper from the basket and went to work on the order. Ranboo went to clean up after some customers after they've left while MD stayed by the cash register as he scrolled through his phone.
The sound of bell chiming rang though out the cafe and the sound of feet walked towards MD. He looked up and greeted the customer.
"Hola! Welcome to Innit's Cafe! How can I help yo-"
What the fuck, the Blade and Philza were standing in front of him.
Philza gave MD a friendly smile but the Blade didn't acknowledge him at all. He was staring at Ranboo.
"One espresso with two sugars please. Oh, and a mini apple pie. Both of them are to go." He elbowed the Blade, likely signalling him to order for himself, but that didn't stop him from staring at Ranboo, who had noticed by now and looked very uncomfortable.
"Eyy, man! Can you NOT stare at mi compañero de trabajo like that? You're acting like a creep!"
Tommy stopped brewing the drinks and looked over at the counter. The Blade just started glaring at Ranboo.
"You look very familiar."
MD hears Ranboo mutter curses under his breath.
He was fucked.
"You look very familiar."
Oh, Ranboo was so very fucked. 
Tubbo's gonna kill him when he finds out about this. He should've listened when the goat hybrid told him to cover himself up more so that no one would recognize him if he were out in the streets.
To be fair, he had the same thought as everyone else.
The residents in the lower levels of Pogtopia believed that the government had completely abandoned them to fend for themselves. It was the prefect example of a dog eat dog world, especially with how many villains were hiding out here.
There are some exceptions of course. People like Tommy and his landlord, Miss Clementine were kind people even after years of living in this shithole.
He watched as Philza tried to calm the Blade down but even he started staring at Ranboo at the corner of his eye, which prompted a bit of a hushed conversation between the two. Most likely they were discussing about any connection of him with Ender.
A tug on his sleeve caught his attention and he turned to look at his boss, who had his customer service face on.
"Hey, Ranboo. Mind getting something from the back for a bit? My hands are full right now. Here, this is the list for the shit I need right now." He handed Ranboo a piece of paper. He glanced at the heroes while they were preoccupied and leaned in a bit closer. "Don't worry. I'll handle this."
Before he could say anything, the older man had pushed him into the break room and the door was shut behind him.
___
"You do know you'll get into trouble if you hide a vigilante, right?"
Tommy just turned to glare at the Blade, who glared back at him.
"Oh is that so? Gosh, I didn't know." He said in a mocking tone. "Now that the distraction is out of the way, are you gonna order or not? Some customers are starting to line up behind you."
True to his words, there were about five customers waiting behind the two heroes, most of them looking very annoyed at the hold up.
The Blade was about to say something but was stopped by Philza delivering a harsh jab to his gut. It didn't hurt but he did get the message.
"A cold latte and a blueberry muffin. Also, to go."
____
Both Philza and Techno were, more or less, kicked out of the Cafe, their orders were practically shoved into their hands.
"Well, that could've gone better."
Phil just sighed tiredly. "Techno, why the hell did you do that? I told you, we just came to order food. No interrogations. It's bad enough that the people here doesn't seem to welcome us."
"Phil, the resemblance was just uncanny. That waiter literally looks so similar to Ender if we ignore that the waiter actually had normal skin color. They were practically one in the same!"
"I know but we can't do anything about it yet. We're not completely sure if that was the same person or not. Remember the Diamond incident?"
Techno just took a sip of his drink. "Oh shit this is good. Also, yes. I do remember that. Seriously, how the fuck did anyone mistaken Skeppy with that guy? What was his name again, Dan?"
"Yeah, Dan TDM."
"To be fair, the only description given to that intern was that Skeppy had blue hair and that he had diamond shards poking out from his body. They were also pretty similar in height." Phil unwrapped his apple pie and took a bite out of it, almost moaning in delight from how good it tasted.
"Oh god, this is good. Tech, why'd you have to go and make yourself an enemy to them?"
"Back to topic though, I have a suspicion that kid IS Ender."
"You sure?"
"Yup, I'm sure."
"We'll keep an eye out on that Cafe then."
__
After they left, Tommy had to repeatedly reassure Ranboo that it's fine and the whole hero confrontation thing isn't going to affect the business. He made sure the dual colored teen calmed down and sent him back to delivering orders since the other teen mad with very clear that he doesn't want to leave, especially after the whole encounter.
__
"What was that anyway?" Ranboo flinched at the question but he started to pick up his pace a little.
He was walking home as MD just started to follow him along the way. MD just stared at him. His expression was unreadable due to the mask he had on his face.
"The whole Hero thing. Did you bump into the Blade?"
Ranboo nodded.
"Shit, tipo. Did he get you anywhere? I heard the man was merciless." MD walked beside him, still limping a bit from the injured ankle. "Yeah, he kinda, um, broke a rib or two. Still hurts like hell."
MD made a shocked noise. 
"And you came in anyways!?"
"Don't act like you didn't come to work with an injury as well, Mr I'm Limping from a Twisted Ankle." 
"Eyy! Clover came outta nowhere, man! I never would've fucking guessed heroes would be coming here!"
"Me too! I thought they'd never poke these areas with a 10 feet long pole!"
